result.name: record-of-qts-awards-in-england-and-wales
result.notes: Part of the dataset held in the CRM Evolve national database of qualified teachers. This is a live dataset including historical data from previous responsible agencies.  Details of individual teachers are accessible to schools and other employers through the Employer Access online service.  This  dataset will transfer into the new Dynamics CRM in late 2013 and will be accessible to relevant stakeholders through a new web based NCTL portal. Source: GTCE TA NCTL

organization.name: national-college-for-teaching-and-leadership
organization.title: National College for Teaching and Leadership
organization.description: Created on 1 April 2013, when the "National College  for Leadership of Schools and Children's Services" merged with the "Teaching Agency" to become the "National College for Teaching and Leadership".

result.title: Record of QTS Awards in England and Wales

extras.value: This is live data that includes personal details. It is available to authorised stakeholders only through Employer Access NCTL portal.
